title: New: Only Real – Blood Carpet
content:
Underneath the playful facade, Niall Galvin aka Only Real is a hopeless romantic.

Over the top of an almost ska style guitar line and choruses of ‘ooh I can’t forget you at all’, Galvin raps with a proficiency that’s startling out of place to his West London surroundings. With 2013 kicking in, by the time the year slips away, you can bet the rest of the UK is going to be reppin’ Real. Check it out below, (as premiered by our friends at Dummy) and keep ’em pealed for Backseat Kissers / Blood Carpet out 28 January on ASL Records.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
